emptyScreen.boardDescription: Looks like this is a bit empty. Why don't you try adding some lists?
emptyScreen.libraryDescription: It appears that the search parameters you entered did not return any results. Why don't you try again?
emptyScreen.listsDescription: Looks like this is a bit empty. Why don't you try creating a list?
emptyScreen.listDescription: Looks like this is a bit empty. Why don't you try adding some games from the library?

modal.deleteGamesHeader: Do you want to delete the games selected?
modal.deleteGamesBody: Keep in mind that this change is irreversible. Once you do it, there is no going back!
